nl.uva.science.wsdtf
Class StreamClient

java.lang.Object
  nl.uva.science.wsdtf.StreamClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
StreamClientImpl
public abstract class StreamClient
extends Object
implements Runnable

This client provides to subclasses a constructor for authorizing the local user, and giving means of communication between the client and an application, so that the client may give to the consumer the data received.

Version:
alpha, 22/08/07
Author:
S. Koulouzis, E. Angelou
